author: Kim Lyons
title: Etsy reminds sellers making cloth face masks: Don’t suggest they prevent COVID 19 infection
description: Etsy sellers have sold hundreds of thousands of cloth face masks, and the CDC has shifted its guidance on wearing such masks in public. But the platform warns sellers they can’t suggest such cloth masks could prevent coronavirus spread. They won’t.
content:
The platform has seen a massive increase in sales of cloth face masks
Etsy sellers have sold hundreds of thousands of cloth face masks in the past few days, the company says, and demand is likely to outstrip supply soon now that the Centers for Disease Contr… [+2006 chars]
